about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Layback in the stretching branches of this old twisty tree by the dunes as the sun rises in front of you. Notice as the sun reveals the many colors held in the surrounding landscape. Next take in the relaxing colors of summer on a lake reflecting like glass. Finally end your retreat underwater with the many fish who come to say hello and check you out.

Purpose
Underwater relaxation
Calming

Length
10:25

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
